ISSUE.TITLE: Putting the Con (COM1, LPT1, NUL, etc.) in URL
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The following URLs will cause a runtime error : http://demo.nopcommerce.com/nul this is limitation of asp.net - http://haacked.com/archive/2010/04/29/allowing-reserved-filenames-in-URLs.aspx/ But if it doesn't work, then we should allow it as "UrlRecord"

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #1887 AdminAuthorizeAttribute class. Removed unused parameter from "HasAdminAccess" method

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1879 Do not allow system names (e.g. "con", "com1", "lpt1", etc) in "Search engine-friendly URL" fields. Anyway they will cause a runtime error.
